channel.title: Remmina usage question
channel.description: Hi, I have read info on wiki and check a lot of posts on forum about using remmina in workstation. I read many recommendation for additional security, but I didn't find answer for most interesting for me question: can I just install Remmina in workstation, connect to any RDP and be sure that RDP administrator or middle man will not able to know my really ip ? Sorry for stupid question and thanks for answers

item.title: Remmina usage question
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
Whonix – 5 May 21

Dev/Leak Tests

Major leak tests for for IP/DNS Leaks. How to check if this application is leaking? How likely that application is leaking? Unsuitable Tests: Location Detection, Operating System Detection.

Read full topic

item.title: Remmina usage question
item.dc:creator: fihlyit
item.description:
Hi, I have read info on wiki and check a lot of posts on forum about using remmina in workstation. I read many recommendation for additional security, but I didn’t find answer for most interesting for me question: can I just install Remmina in workstation, connect to any RDP and be sure that RDP administrator or middle man will not able to know my really ip ?
Sorry for stupid question and thanks for answers

Read full topic
